name: Refusal of refund value payment for a deposit beverage container
text:
Redemption centers shall refuse to pay the refund value on any broken, corroded, or dismembered deposit beverage container, or any deposit beverage container that:
     (1)  Contains a free-flowing liquid;
     (2)  Does not properly indicate a refund value; or
     (3)  Contains a significant amount of foreign material. [L 2002, c 176, pt of §2; am L 2005, c 206, §5]
